title: Gluten free and dairy free chiffon sponge cake
ingredients: ['285g gluten free flour', '120g caster sugar', '5 teaspoons gluten free baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon each of two ground spices (cardamom, ginger, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, etc.) - optional', '6 eggs, separated (360g-380g weighed in their shells)', '125ml vegetable oil', '160ml water', '1 orange, or 2 unwaxed lemons, zested and juiced', 'Optional toppings', '1 orange, or 2 unwaxed lemons, juiced', '50g caster sugar', '300ml whipping cream', '50g icing sugar', '150g orange or lemon curd', '2 to 4 meringues, crumbled']
